pullrequest.title: Added urdf gazebo extension option to disable fixed joint lumping

content.raw:
Just noticed that we should also update https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/src/default/ros_urdf/tutorial.md . 
Apparently the tutorials are versioned on Gazebo version, while this is a feature related to an SDF version... any thoughts on how to proceed?
